name: Animals
author: Cascade AI
description: A list of common animal names.

words.hint: A large carnivorous feline that lives in prides.
A large solitary cat with a yellow-brown coat of fur with dark vertical stripes.
A large, heavy mammal that walks on the soles of its feet, with thick fur and a very short tail.
A very large herbivorous mammal with a trunk, large ears, and tusks.
A small to medium-sized primate that typically has a long tail.
A large African mammal with a very long neck and forelegs, having a coat patterned with brown patches.
An African wild horse with black-and-white stripes.
A large plant-eating marsupial with a long powerful tail and strongly developed hindlimbs that allow it to travel by leaping.
A large flightless seabird of the southern hemisphere, with black and white plumage and a streamlined body for swimming.
A small gregarious toothed whale that typically has a beaklike snout and a curved fin on the back.
